subject: Millrose Games
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Matt Centrowitz, who decided to turn pro and forgo his senior year at Oregon in the fall, won the Wanamaker Mile in 3 minutes 53.92 seconds.
snippet: Matt Centrowitz, who decided to turn pro and forgo his senior year at Oregon in the fall, won the Wanamaker Mile in 3 minutes 53.92 seconds.
